Where do you get the Old Paint?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battle Card Archive (Game Boy): Items: Where do you get the Old Paint?
By Magma Bird on Wednesday, August 2, 2000 - 08:15 pm:

I haven't played in a long time and was wondering where or how do you get the old paint?

Adios

By Eagle_Fierce on Thursday, August 3, 2000 - 06:15 pm:

Sorry, Magma Bird, but I honestly have never found the "Old Paint." I do, however, beliee that once you use the "Old Paint" on the finished "Mural," you will recieve the disc stone for the Phoenix. That, I am ALMOST positive on. As for the possible location of it...how many times have you went back? I'm guessing that after you get everything in the game, and after the past changes enough, the gatekeeper (my nickname for the one that sends you back in time) will give it to you instead of asking you to go back. However, remember that this is all hypothetical.

By Magma Bird on Saturday, August 5, 2000 - 06:15 pm:

Eagle, I found it in a ruin (inside a treasure chest). In fact I found three of them while searching for holy coins. You don't use it on the mural, after you give Knox the old paint you can reproduce any battle card you want. Also I just found something called "feather" which is kind of like the fire feather but you have to have a password to trde it to Mac for a phoenix(I think) so all I have to do is find the password. I also need some more holy coins to battle that one guy's freind's brother(I already battled two poeple before him)

Adios

By Eagle_Fierce on Saturday, August 5, 2000 - 07:29 pm:

So, it's just a REALLY RARE random item, then? Thanks for letting me know. I think I'll just put the game up now, though. I doubt even a Phoenix card is worth having to repeat the game constantly! Good luck to you.
